title: Acceleration vs time graph for system of objects

content.question: An object is released from rest near a planet’s surface. A graph of the acceleration as a function of time for the object is shown for the <math alttext="4 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mtext> </mtext><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> after the object is released. The positive direction is considered to be upward. What is the displacement of the object after <math alttext="2 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mtext> </mtext><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
